events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund after reviewing the customer's delivery complaint.
The case was assigned to support agent Emily for refund processing and further assistance.
Hello, I’m Emily from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 982374, and I attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for providing the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should receive the amount within 5 business days.
Thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to the refund.
The refund case has been resolved and the payment is underway. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything is okay or if you need more help.
As we have not received any further questions, this refund case will now be formally closed. Thank you for contacting us.
